alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 2:05PM AKST until March 01 at 11:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow with periods of blizzard conditions. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...Until 11 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will slowly decrease late tonight and conditions will slowly improve late tonight.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
